reviewText: This is a very intense film, yet sweet, pure and innocent. Pretty unpredictable as well. The acting is great and makes you feel everything is so real. I cried a lot during this film.
Well done movie but sad story about the place of woman in that world
an incredibly tragic and moving story

What an incredible movie!  This is a love story about 2 young people living in the Middle East who are in love, but the father promised her her a different man for marriage.  While I normally do not like subtitles this movie was definitely worth watching. The acting is incredible, photography so real. It is hard to believe this goes on in modern times, we have to educate ourselves
to understand what it is like.
absolutely beautiful cinematography,great story and a tear jerker..social realism at its best..the director needs to be commended on the portayal of the characters
